text:
When you need a little hope, look to a neighbor. 

Throughout the #COVID19 crisis, neighbors across the city have stepped up to care for one another. Whether it’s sharing a meal, a smile, or a study tip, the ways Chicagoans lend a hand defines the spirit of the city we call home. https://t.co/G8nKlGFgL8
